summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.2°C) and outside temperature (up 2.5°C).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 4314 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 3527 lux), dew point temperature (up 2.8°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and winds should remain light. Chance of light rain, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
